label: logicB:psychology_en
steps: [1] If a person is chronically sleep deprived, they tend to show elevated stress markers.
[2] If a person shows elevated stress markers, they tend to develop concentration difficulties.
[3] For any person x, if x practices mindfulness, x shows reduced rumination.
[4] If Jordan has concentration difficulties and reduced rumination, then the treatment should prioritize sleep restoration.
[7] From [1–3], [5], and [6], Jordan has concentration difficulties and reduced rumination.
[8] From [4] and [7], Jordan’s treatment should prioritize sleep restoration.
